name: agglutinative
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of a language) using words that contain many elements that each express a meaning rather than separate words for each meaning: Finnish is an agglutinative language in which grammatical relationships are expressed mainly by suffixes. Hungarian uses agglutinative suffixes to show the person and number of the subject. This language is agglutinative, and combines morphemes to build words. Compare

More examplesFewer examplesThe complex agglutinative morphology of Hungarian must be learned.Turkish is an agglutinative language with very productive suffixes and inflections.It is an agglutinative language in which the tense and person are shown by adding to the verbal stem.
